thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com
thread.title: Michael Simpson

author: Michael Simpson
title: Michael Simpson
text: We have been members for several years, and have done about 20 house- and pet-sits. We are completely happy with the community and service provided by TrustedHousesitters. This is a great way to pick travel destinations that one might overlook, to meet some really nice people, and to enjoy the pleasures of cats, dogs, and other animals on a temporary basis. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
